q_ch: Emily订购的Dress订单生产进度如何？用百分比来表示。
q_en: What is the production progress of the Dress ordered by Emily? Please represent it in percentage.

command: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'Emily';
SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = 'c3';
SELECT p.id FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE pt.description = 'Dress';

SELECT id, number FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN (SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = 'c3') AND product_id IN (SELECT p.id FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE pt.description = 'Dress');

SELECT SUM(planned_number) AS total_planned_cutting, SUM(completed_number) AS total_completed_cutting FROM cutting_tasks WHERE order_product_id IN (SELECT id FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN (SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = 'c3') AND product_id IN (SELECT p.id FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE pt.description = 'Dress'));

SELECT SUM(planned_number) AS total_planned_sewing, SUM(completed_number) AS total_completed_sewing FROM sewing_tasks WHERE order_product_id IN (SELECT id FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN (SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = 'c3') AND product_id IN (SELECT p.id FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE pt.description = 'Dress'));

SELECT (total_completed_cutting + total_completed_sewing) / (total_planned_cutting + total_planned_sewing) * 100 AS production_progress FROM (SELECT SUM(planned_number) AS total_planned_cutting, SUM(completed_number) AS total_completed_cutting FROM cutting_tasks WHERE order_product_id IN (SELECT id FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN (SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = 'c3') AND product_id IN (SELECT p.id FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE pt.description = 'Dress'))) AS cutting, (SELECT SUM(planned_number) AS total_planned_sewing, SUM(completed_number) AS total_completed_sewing FROM sewing_tasks WHERE order_product_id IN (SELECT id FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN (SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = 'c3') AND product_id IN (SELECT p.id FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE pt.description = 'Dress'))) AS sewing;
